name: skaterbo1#20xx
description:
REMIX! BIG THANKS TO @deviever FOR BEING A BAUSS AND NOT ONLY GIVING US GRAPHICS, BUT ALSO IMPLEMENTING THEM!

!JUMP AND DUCK!

left click to duck, right click to jump

This is me and my friends first game ever.

We sat down together monday evening and stopped thursday evening, I think we did pretty well.

Be sure to give us some feedback, my twitter is @myidoss and my friends twitter is @hotplastichull

also thanks to @Prelucid for giving us some incredible art, even though we didn't know how to use it (sorry).

And of course thanks to @deviever for giving us the inspiration to even make a game!
